returns._0: amount of the unclaimed collateral tokens
delay for setting a new receiver or changing the delay itself (in seconds)
address of the global receiver of the slashed funds

params.amount: virtual amount of the collateral slashed
params.captureTimestamp: time point when the stake was captured
params.subnetwork: full identifier of the subnetwork (address of the network concatenated with the uint96 identifier)

returns._1: timestamp timestamp since which the pending delay can be used
timestamp timestamp since which the pending global receiver can be used
timestamp timestamp since which the pending receiver can be used
timestamp timestamp since which the pending receiver can be used

operatorNetworkReceiver(address,address).notice: Get a router receiver for a slashed operator by a slashing network.

pendingNetworkReceiver(address).notice: Get a router pending receiver for a slashing network.

pendingOperatorNetworkReceiver(address,a.notice: Get a router pending receiver for a slashed operator by a slashing network.

setDelay(uint48).notice: Set a new delay for setting a new receiver or changing the delay itself.

setNetworkReceiver(address,address).notice: Set a new receiver for a slashing network.

setOperatorNetworkReceiver(address,addre.notice: Set a new receiver for a slashed operator by a slashing network.

triggerTransfer(address).notice: Trigger a transfer of the unclaimed collateral to the receiver.
